defs: a bold, courageous man.
a boy who is enrolled for study at a school, college, etc. for studying a course; a student.
a man who guards or has charge of students of a college or in a hostel; a student-warden.
a building or system where lodging, usu. with boarding, facilities for students is provided; a student hostel.
= ಛಾದನ.
the act or an instance of hiding, covering with.
a large, rectangular piece of cotton, linen, silk, etc., used on a bed or as a wrapper over the body; a sheet; bedspread.
an oblong cloth, interlaced with silk threads, worn as a covering for the head or shoulders; a shawl.
covered; concealed; veiled; incognito.
tending to cover, conceal; veiling.
a overhanging projection or drapery, awning or other roof-like covering fastened above a bed, throne, etc. or held on poles over a person or sacred thing; a canopy.
observing religious rites and rituals scrupulously.
a man versed with Vedas.
a dull, ignorant man; a dunce; a stupid.
the quality or condition of being negligent; habitual failure to do the required thing; carelessness; negligence.
want of quickness, swiftness; slothfulness; slowness.
a man characterised by slowness, inactiveness; a sluggish man.
the disinclination for working; laziness; indolence; slothfulness; sluggishness.
= ಛಾನಸ1.
= ಛಾನಸ2.
a building with equipments for printing from inked types, plates, rolls or for photo printing; a printing press.
a sheet of paper, embossed with any of various denomination government stamps, for use in recording and registering legal agreements between two or more parties.

to produce (a text, picture, etc.) by applying inked types, plates, blocks or the like, to paper or other material either by direct pressure or indirectly by offsetting an impression or image onto an intermediate roller; to print.
a mark, impression made by imprinting; imprint.
(fig.) an impression or effect produced, on another's or others mind, by one's influence, manner, knowledge, etc..
ಛಾಪು ಹಾಕು chāpu hāku (fig.) to produce an impression or effect on another's mind, by one's influence, manner, knowledge, etc.
= ಛಾಪಾಕಾಗದ.
the power or act of a demon, ghost, imp, etc. that is believed to seize a person by seizing his shadow.
the most shining point of a diamond.
the representation of light or shade in a picture; the act of shading.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Māyāmāḷava Gauḷa.
that which produces a visual impression of something by reflection; a mirror.
the act of a demon, ghost, imp, etc. that is believed to seize a person by seizing his shadow.
the act of taking a picture of (something) with a camera.
(fig.) a knowing of something by cursory glance or running through.
(an evil spirit) to seize a person by holding that person's shadow.
a device for taking photographs, consisting essentially of a closed box containing a sensitized plate or film on which an image is formed when light enters the box through a lens or hole; a camera.
a man who takes photographs (esp. as an occupation or hobby); photographer.
a woman who takes photographs (esp. as an occupation or hobby); photographer.
holding, seizing the shadow of a person.
taking photograph of.
= ಛಾಯಾಗ್ರಾಹಕ.
an image or picture made by photography with a camera; a photograph.
a copy of printed or other graphic material made by a device (photocopier) which photographically reproduces the original; a photocopy.
= ಛಾಯಾಗ್ರಾಹಕ.
(mus.) a mode, in old system, now obsolete.
(myth.) one of the two wives of the Sun-God.
an absolutely lone man.
= ಛಾಯಾನಾಟ.
a play produced by showing to the audience only the shadows of actors or puppets on a screen; a shadow-play.
a mimicry of a drama or play.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Vāgadhīśvari.
a close or constant companion who often follows blindly.
a translated passage, speech, article etc. giving the idea of the original, but which is not a verbatim.
(myth.) the Sun-God, the husband of Chāya.
the spiral galaxy containing our sun, seen from the earth as a broad, faintly luminous band of stars and interstellar gas, arching across the night sky; the milky-way.
the plant Oldenlandia umbellata of Rubiaceae family; Indian maddar; chay root plant.
its root, used for medicinal purposes.
an instrument that indicates time by the position of a gnomoṇs shadow cast by the sun on the face of a dial marked in hours; a sun-dial.
the shade or shades of a horse that is supposed to indicate its quality.
in archery, a target which is to be shot at looking at its shadow.
(mus.) a mode, in Karnāṭaka system, derived from the main mode Sūryakānta.
the science of measuring time with the help of the shadow (as in a sun-dial).
= ಛಾಯಾಬೇರು.
the shadow of one's body.
(fig.) a close or constant companion who often follows blindly.
the dark image made by a body intercepting the light rays; a shadow.
a person or thing very much like another; a copy; an image.
an impression or effect produced, on another's or others mind, by one's influence, manner, etc.
the comparative brightness or darkness (esp. in photography, painting).
something that indicates; a sign; an indication.
(gen.) the property of reflecting light of a particular wavelength: a colour.
(myth.) one of the two wives of the Sun-God.
to give an indication using a sign, gesture, etc.; to hint; to indicate.
to lose one's original colour; to become pale.
to seem or become physically weaker.
to lose one's importance, regard or glory.
money paid or to be paid for transportation in a train, taxi, plane, etc.; fare.

charge - a) responsibility or duty (as of an officer, minister, etc.); b) care, custody or supervision (of something); c) the amount charged by a professional (as a doctor, consultant, etc.) for the service rendered; d) the cost or price of an article.
an instrument for striking or flogging, consisting generally of a stiff or flexible rod with a lash attached to one end; a whip.
a thin, twisted cord, used by children to spin a top, a cone-shaped toy, on its pointed end.
a hall or building where governmental deliberations are officially held; a court.
the building, platform or an open space where the members of village administration body meet for deliberation.
a raised platform in front of a house, attached to the front wall, on either side of the main entrance, used as a sit-out.
a place of protection; a shelter.
the office of local police force.
a place where tents, huts, barracks or other more or less temporary structures have been put up for soldiers; a camp.
the outside top covering of a building; the roof, roof-top, terrace.
a house or home.
to live or stay in a house (usu. said in a house other than one's own).
= ಛಾವಣಿ.
the creeper Tinosporia cordifolia (= Menispermum cordifolium, = Cocculus cordifolius) of Menispermaceae family; moon-creeper.
to cut into small pieces; to chop up; to mince.
an indeclinable used to express abhorrence, detestation, deep repugnance, etc.
a kind of deer .
the bursting sound made by a burning thing as a dry bamboo.
a sound imitating it.
having hardness and rigidity but little tensile strength; breaking readily with a comparatively smooth fracture, as glass; brittle.
a person who feels hatred for, fosters harmful designs against or engages in antagonistic activities against another; a hostile person; an enemy.
an opening through something; gap; an aperture: a hole.
lack of something necessary for completeness; a defect, deficiency, shortcoming.
an open break in a previously friendly relationship; a rift.
an artificial channel or passage for water; a sluice.
to break into pieces; to smash.
that which lives in a hole; a snake.
(fig.) a man who takes advantage of other's labour, effort.
a kind of poison (esp. trioxide of arsenic) used to kill rats; a rat-poison.
that which is broken, has holes, rifts, etc.
a thing that is marred by defects, deficiencies, etc.
a finding fault in other's work (esp. deliberately).
a person given to finding fault; a captious complainer; a fault-finder.
split or cracked into pieces; broken, splintered, fractured, burst, etc.
disrupted, as by divorce; disintegrated.
to break or shatter into pieces.
to cause to have dissent, distrust, between two or among persons.
to treat with disrespect or contempt.
to breach faith; to fail to maintain trust; to cheat.
to steal; to commit theft.
to get secret information (esp. from one's enemy-camp).
an unchaste, promiscuous woman.
rendered into pieces; broken; shattered; smashed.
spoiled; destroyed.
a kind of lung-disease.
(dance.) a positioning of oneself in a standing pose by keeping the hands on the waist in a particular mode.
(dance.) a pressing of both the rows of the teeth on each other.
a person not having firm devotion to the God.
the creeper Tinosporia cordifolia (= Menispermum cordifolium, = Cocculus cordifolius of Menispermaceae family; moon-creeper.
(bot.) the broken peak or point (of a leaf).
(bot.) the quality, state or fact of the peak or point (of a leaf) being broken.
the sound produced by a sudden gush of a liquid through a small opening.
a sound imitating it.
the bursting sound made by a burning thing as a dry bamboo.
a sound imitating it.
an indeclinable used to express abhorrence, detestation, deep repugnance, etc..
ಛೀ ಪೆಟ್ಟು ಹಾಕು chī peṭṭu hāku = ಛೀಮಾರಿ ಹಾಕು; ಛೀ ಹಾಕು chī hāku = ಛೀಮಾರಿ ಹಾಕು.
to rebuke, chide using harsh or abusive language; to scold; to reprimand.
the act or an instance of chiding, rebuking harshly. ಛೀಮಾರಿ ಮಾಡು chīmāri māḍu = ಛೀಮಾರಿ ಹಾಕು; ಛೀಮಾರಿ ಹಾಕು; chīmāri hāku to rebuke harshly; to reprimand heavily.
a kind of mouse, that is small in size, with long, pointed snout.
the act of spreading throughout or all over.
a short, sword-like weapon with a pointed blade and a handle, used for stabbing; a stagger.
(dance) one of the thirty-five kinds of movements on the floor.
joined or mingled (into a single mass); blended; mixed.
a word used to command a dog to fall upon (someone) or to attack.
a method of humorous or subtly sarcastic expression in which the intended meaning of the words is the direct opposite of their usual sense; a biting remark; an irony.
a writing characterised by such an irony.
to set a dog on or against; to urge a dog to fall upon.
to stimulate or incite a person against another.
a magic formula or set of mystic syllables by magicians, exorcists.
an indeclinable used to express disgust, abhorrence, detestation, deep repugnance, etc.
any domesticated, tamed animal.
a clever, intelligent man.
a man living in a city (as diff. from the one in the countryside).
a man having inclination for fine arts and who can enjoy the subtleties or fineness in them.
a kind of alliteration, in which two syllables repeat in different words following each other.
(rhet.) a kind of figure of speech in which the truth or fact is subtly concealed to make it not obvious.
(rhet.) a kind of figure of speech in which a popular saying, proverb, etc. is interpreted in an uncommon way.
deep trouble; great loss and sorrow; disaster; calamity.
to provoke or enrage with stinging, pungent a remark.
to annoy, tease or rag for fun.
the act of cutting, severing, separating; abscission.
the act or an instance of destroying.
a small part of a whole; a fragment; a piece.
(Math.) the number below the line in a fraction, which shows into how many parts the integer is divided; a denominator.
(dance.) one of the twenty actions of the hand, depicting the action of cutting.
that cuts; tending to cut.
an instrument used in cutting; a pair of scissors or a knife, etc. .
to separate by cutting or abscission; to cut; to break.
to overpower; to overcome; to beat; to win victory over or destroy; to defeat.
that is to be cut, broken or divided into pieces.
fit to be or that can be cut, broken or divided.
that can be divided; divisible.
a boy; a lad.
(gen. pronounced with the vowel 'a') the twenty-second letter of Kannaḍa alphabet and the eighth consonant.
a symbol for the number eight.
(pros.) a syllabic feet consisting of one long syllable between two short ones; Amphibrachys.
a scolding or chastising using harsh words.
the characteristic short, sharp sound, as small birds; chirping.
a looking or treating with contempt; a condemning.
a particular mode in mace-fighting.
to chide, scold verbally using harsh words.
to treat with contempt; to look down; to slight.
to utter a long, shrill sound, as from pain, fear, etc.; to scream.
to be afraid of; to become diffident; to hesitate in doing, undertaking, etc.
the loud, deep sound made by an animal as a lion; roaring.
any sound that is distinctive or characteristic of its source; identifiable noise, tone.
a thick, heavy fabric of wool or cotton for covering a floor; a carpet.
the flesh of a person or animal.
moving, movable or capable of moving from place to place; not fixed or still; mobile.
that which is moving, capable of moving; an animate thing (as distinguished from the inanimate, which cannot move on its own).
a Śaiva mendicant who does not stay at one place for more than a certain number of days.
the poison secreted by snakes, scorpion, etc.
the plant Glycosmis cohinchinensis of Rutaceae family.
the wife of an ever-wandering Śaiva devotee.
= ಜಂಗಮಗಿತ್ತಿ.
the condition, quality or tendency of not being at one place; a wandering; vagabondage.
a wandering Śaiva mendicant, regarded as Śiva himself.
the movable symbol in which Śiva is worshipped.
a monastery for wandering Śaiva mendicants.
the poison secreted by snakes, scorpion, etc.; venom.
a malignant, spiteful or malicious person (considered figuratively as wandering venom).
to move (oneself from place to place); to go; to walk.
that which moves or tends to keep moving.
that which is not movable from one place to another.
a vast tract of land covered with dense growth of trees, tall vegetation, vines, etc., and inhabited by predatory animals; a jungle.
(fig.) any confused, tangled growth, collection, etc.
= ಜಂಗಲಿಬಾದಾಮಿ.
a tract of land having little or no vegetation; barren land.
of, relating to, from or living in a forest.
any of several diseases of tropical forest regions, esp. a severe variety of malarial fever; jungle-fever.
the tree Sterculia foetida of Sterculiaceae family.
its nut.
excessive love, affection, attraction, desire or attachment one has for something.
the quality or fact of being not tight or giving more room than required (said of clothing); looseness.
a pouring down of something.
a falling down.
a loose clothing.
to flow in deluge; to inundate.
to make (something) become loose; to loosen; to make less tight.
a set of horizontally fastened wooden planks, placed on two boats ferrying together.
= ಜಂಗಾಲ.
the greenish blue colour a basic copper carbonate pigment consisting of ground azurite; blue verditer.
of or relating to war, military ammunitions; military.
special; particular; outstanding; exceptional.
to walk with the jingling sound of anklet-chains.
to become greater in size, amount, degree, etc.; to rush (oneself) with overwhelming vehemence.
to jump, leap forward or up.
a vehement, violent wrestling; a contest between two strong wrestlers.
a heavy conflict between two rival armies.
to be affected by a rust or fungus by oxidation as during exposure to air and moisture; to rust.
the red or orange coating that forms on the surface of iron when exposed to air and moisture, consisting chiefly of ferric hydroxide and ferric oxide formed by oxidation; rust.
a set of small, thick bells of brass, stitched to a cloth-pad, worn round the ankle by Śaiva mendicants or stage-actors.
a small bell for tying round the neck of an ox, horse, etc.
a hostile contention; a war.
an army of soldiers.
ಜಂಗು ತಿನ್ನು jangu tinnu = ಜಂಗು1; ಜಂಗು ಹಿಡಿ jangu hiḍi = ಜಂಗು1; 2. (fig.) to be unused or become useless, redundant.
a kind of stringed, musical instrument.
the act or manner of grasping, seizing; a hold, control or seize.
to slip down or collapse losing the grip or control.
the part of the body including this joint and extending to the base of the neck; the shoulder.
a large number of people, animals, things etc. being together; a crowd.
the common people; the masses.
= ಜಂಗುಳಿಗ.
a snake-charmer or one who gives antidotes to remedy snake-bites.
a man who is proficient in using charms, spells, rituals etc. to create an illusion or appearance that is seemingly real and lasts for a short while; a magician.
a pencil of rays.
popularity gained among the common people, esp. uneducated people not having keen discrimination in any field.
a man inclined to like the masses or who runs after cheap popularity among them.
to come together in a large group or as a mass-force.
= ಜಂಗುಜರಿ.
(jain.) a mystic power of moving to a distant place in the air without touching the ground with the feet.
a man having strong shanks, hence one who can walk or run fast.
a man who carries message from one place to another; a messenger.
the strength in the legs; the ability to walk or run.

characterised by speed of motion; capable of running fast.
a man who can move, esp. run, fast.
(dance.) one of the nineteen types of movements of the foot in the air in popular system of dancing.
(dance.) one of the nineteen types of movements of the foot in the air in popular system of dancing.
the act of running or ability to run fast.
the tendency of withdrawing from facing a dangerous, difficult or painful situation, as from fear, diffidence, etc.
the lower part of the leg; part between the knee and ankle in humans; the shank.
the fleshy back part of the leg below the knee; the calf.
a state of mental distress; trouble; agony.
a complicated, perplexed condition; tangle.
the jingling or metallic sound.
a sound imitating it.
to make jingling sound or sounds.
a fetter or shackle for the hands or feet.
a complicated situation getting out of from which is difficult.
common; unexceptional; average; or relatively poor quality; ordinary.
the common order in which things are arranged, without being specially classified.

= ಜಂಜರ2.
a set of numbers following the natural or common order.
= ಜಂಜಡ.

a large gun with a long barrel, mounted on a pivot to facilitate it to turn horizontally in all directions.

the sound made by high-speed wind.

storm accompanied by rain.
a violent cyclone with winds moving at a very high speed.

occurring or existing in a high degree; very strong; violent, extreme, sharp.

the quality of being brave, courageous; courage; bravery.
open armed conflict between two hostile armies.
an army of courageous soldiers.
(fig.) a cruel or inhuman action.
= ಜಂಝಾನಿಲ.

the condition or an instance of two or more things, persons being associated together; ಜಂಟಿ ದೇವರು jaṇṭi dēvaru (pl.) the twin, celestial physicians; ಜಂಟಿ ಹಾಕು jaṇṭi hāku to join (two things, persons) together; to pair.
a set of three small stone, planted at a place to mark the boundary of a piece of land.
a senior officer in charge of a department of government, working jointly with another in the same position with equal responsibility.
any of the two men working together as a pair.
one of two or more persons engaged in the same business enterprise and sharing its profits and risks; a partner.
a title-deed or any other ownership-document (esp. of a land) becoming in the joint names of two persons.
one of the two or more persons entitled to a piece of land or other landed property.
a series of pairs of musical notes set as a preliminary exercise for students of Karnāṭaka music.
to join two or more things together in an orderly manner.
the palm tree Pinanga dicksonii (= Areca dicksonii) of Arecaceae family.
its nut.
the reed Typha angustata of Typhaceae family; elephant grass; reed mace.
a piece of cloth bearing a design, motto, slogan, etc., attached to a staff; a banner; a flag.
(fig.) a brief or temporary stay.
an ornamental tuft of threads, natural hairs, etc. of equal length, hanging loosely from a knob or from the knot by which they are tied together; a tassel.
a bunch of flowers or fruits.

one of the hard bodies attached in a row to each jaw, serving for the pretension and mastication of food, and in mammals typically composed chiefly of dentin surrounding a sensitive pulp and covered on the crown with enamel; a tooth.
a tooth developed to a great length, usu. one of a pair, as in the elephant, walrus, and wild boar; a tusk.
the width of a long cloth as manufactured (before it is cut for any purpose).
a kind of agricultural implement, with a thick, cylindrical wooden piece attached with two or more tooth-like part for raking the ground, and a long beam to be attached to a yoke.

a cross-beam of a building, serving as a support for the roof.
a man trading in the tusks of elephants.
any living organism excluding plants, esp. of the lowest organisation as worms, insects.
in gen. an animal.

the ficus tree Ficus racemosa (= F. glomerata) of Moraceae family; fig tree.

a cover; a veil.
to cover with a cloth, veil, lid, etc.

to quiver, shiver from fear, cold, etc.; to tremble.
to prevent (something) from happening; to avoid (a difficult or dangerous situation).
temporary loss of one's bodily awareness, resulting from rapture, melody, tiredness, etc.; the state of being stupefied.
a state in which the mind and senses are dulled for want of sleep; sleepiness; drowsiness.
a kind of ornament for the ears.
imposing beauty; splendour; magnificence.
a box or enclosed structure made of wires, bars, etc., for confining birds or animals; a cage.

a pretending to be what one is not or to feel what one does not feel; esp. a pretense of virtue, piety, etc.; hypocrisy.

ಜಂಬ ಅಡಗಿಸು jamba aḍagisu to bring down another's undue pride, arrogance etc.; ಜಂಬದ ಕೋಳಿ jambada kōḷi (fig.) a vain, strutting, swaggering person.
